document.webtitle: Why does the elderly gather at McDonalds every morning? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: ... bunch of senior citizens in a fast food restaurant ... and they don't care if you buy a cup of coffee and take ... It's a safe, clean place to sit, drink coffee ...
